schema:name: Consumption based greenhouse gas emissions in England, 2001 to 2021

schema:creator.schema:name: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

schema:isBasedOn.schema:description:
This publication looks at the carbon footprint for the UK and England.

The carbon footprint refers to emissions that are associated with the consumption spending of UK/England’s residents on goods and services, wherever in the world these emissions arise along the supply chain, and those which are directly generated by UK/England’s households through private motoring and burning fuel to heat homes. These emissions are often referred to as ‘consumption emissions’ to distinguish them from estimates relating to the emissions ‘produced’ within a country’s territory or economic sphere.

The next release see statistics release calendar

Defra statistics: Waste and Recycling

Email WasteStatistics@defra.gov.uk
schema:isBasedOn.schema:name: UK and England's carbon footprint to 2021

schema:author.schema:name: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

schema:isBasedOn.schema:text: Annual greenhouse gas and carbon dioxide emissions relating to UK and England consumption.

UK full dataset 1990 - 2021, including conversion factors by SIC code
England full dataset 2001 - 2021, including conversion factors by SIC code
Table 13 -  Indirect emissions from the supply chain - original data
Conversion factors KgCO2 per £ spent, by SIC code 2021
Carbon footprint statistical release figures and tables dataset

schema:variableMeasured: Greenhouse gas emissions associated with England’s consumption, in million tonnes CO2 equivalent
notes:
The data used in the model to produce these statistics is updated with every annual update, which may result in changes to the time series.
    
</br>The 2020 datapoint covers the first year of the COVID-19 pandemic and the associated national lockdowns and travel restrictions. This probably had an impact on emissions, especially on emissions from transport generated directly from households and the emissions associated with household spend on air travel, hotels and restaurants.

columns.name: year
columns.schema:description: The year range for the data present

datatype.format: GHGs from England produced goods and services consumed by England's residents|GHGs embedded in imported goods and services to England|Direct household emissions of GHGs
